DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to examine the effect of AZD5672 (dosed to steady state) on the pharmacokinetics of digoxin (single dose administration).
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study - Effect of AZD5672 on the Pharmacokinetics of Digoxin
DOC.criteria: Provision of signed written informed consent. Females should not be of childbearing potential Clinically normal physical and laboratory findings as judged by the investigator, including negative drug test and negative tests of Hepatitis B surface antigen, antibodies to Hepatitis C virus and antibodies to HIV. Any clinically significant disease or disorder which, in the opinion of the investigator, may either put the subject at risk because of participation in the study, or may influence the results of the study, or the subject's ability to participate Known allergy to digoxin or previous complications to digoxin therapy. Participation in any clinical study involving an investigational product in the 3 months prior to enrolment.
